item.description:
What better reason to eat ice cream than Flag Day! This is a very informal and FREE event. Everyone will order on their own and we will congregate at a picnic table or 2 depending how many people want to join us. 

This event has been rescheduled.

Reminder: You are now able to join as a mid year member for half price of $6 for the remainder of the year! I know that most of you plan on attending at least 3 events over the next 6 months. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

DIRECTIONS:

Easily accessible from routes 95 and 27. Please click on the map on this event page for best directions from your departure location.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet near the windows where you order. If you are there first, grab a picnic table!

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Rescheduled: It's Flag Day, so let's eat ice cream!
